channel.title: Someone have a link to a
channel.description: please could someone either give me - a link - explain ----------------------------------- = how to get my server online = what to tell my friends to do to get on to my server with them = what i need to do to run my server with deltascape (or give me another server/client to run it with) = all the stuff i need to know to get my server on to moparscape server status page so anyone can get on to my server = ((ive already port-forwarded but what is a static ip address) is that any different from my normal ip address) = I WILL BE UPDATING THIS TO ASK MORE QUESTIONS THANKS VERY MUCH [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] Mute not given for this post, but for previous postings which were deleted. That kind of immature attitude will not be tolerated.[/center]

item.title: Someone have a link to a
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Lewis):

Yeah sure , here.

Nice attempt at acting cool, but HE’S ALREADY IN THE HELP SECTION…

fuck me now:

= how to get my server online

Click the thing that says ‘run’.

fuck me now:

= what to tell my friends to do to get on to my server with them

Get No-IP, tell them to get a client and type in your IP. There’s a stickied tutorial for setting up a server in the tutorial section.

fuck me now:

= what i need to do to run my server with deltascape (or give me another server/client to run it with)

Get another source, DeltaScape is way over used.

fuck me now:

= all the stuff i need to know to get my server on to moparscape server status page so anyone can get on to my server

You need to know how take pictures, upload them to an image hosting site, and how to type.

fuck me now:

= ((ive already port-forwarded but what is a static ip address) is that any different from my normal ip address)

Read about this here.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone have a link to a
item.dc:creator: @fuck_me_now fuck me now
item.description:
@fuck_me_now wrote:

please could someone either give me

  • a link
  • explain

= how to get my server online
= what to tell my friends to do to get on to my server with them
= what i need to do to run my server with deltascape (or give me another server/client to run it with)
= all the stuff i need to know to get my server on to moparscape server status page so anyone can get on to my server
= ((ive already port-forwarded but what is a static ip address) is that any different from my normal ip address)
= I WILL BE UPDATING THIS TO ASK MORE QUESTIONS THANKS VERY MUCH
[center] Mute not given for this post, but for previous postings which were deleted. That kind of immature attitude will not be tolerated.[/center]
